pkgmetadata.longdescription: soilwater: Implements parametric formulas for soil water retention or conductivity curve // It contains implementations of parametric formulas for soil water retention or conductivity curve. At the moment, only Van Genuchten (for soil water retention curve) and Mualem (for hydraulic conductivity) were implemented. See reference \url{http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Water_retention_curve}. Any contributions or suggestions are warmly welcomed.
